Evaluate resuscitation effect.sentence: The healthcare provider assesses the patient's vital signs to determine the effectiveness of resuscitation efforts.
Evaluate resuscitation effect.subject: The healthcare provider
Evaluate resuscitation effect.tools: stethoscope, pulse oximeter, blood pressure monitor

Evaluate resuscitation effect.sentence: The healthcare provider evaluates the patient's responsiveness and airway patency to gauge the success of resuscitation.
Evaluate resuscitation effect.subject: The healthcare provider
Evaluate resuscitation effect.object: the patient's responsiveness and airway patency

Evaluate resuscitation effect.sentence: The healthcare provider checks for adequate circulation by palpating the carotid pulse to assess blood flow.
Evaluate resuscitation effect.subject: The healthcare provider

Evaluate resuscitation effect.sentence: The healthcare provider reviews the patient's cardiac rhythm using an electrocardiogram (ECG) to identify any abnormalities.
Evaluate resuscitation effect.subject: The healthcare provider

Evaluate resuscitation effect.sentence: The healthcare provider documents the findings and interventions performed to ensure accurate patient records.
Evaluate resuscitation effect.subject: The healthcare provider
